validation.BOOLEAN: {property} must be a checked or unchecked
validation.PASSWORD_DOESNT_MATCH_CONSTRAINTS: Password should has minimum eight characters, at least one letter, one number and one special character
validation.REPEAT_PASSWORD_DOESNT_MATCH: Repeated password should match the original one, please check it
validation.MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}
validation.MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}
validation.MAX_STRING_LENGTH: {property} with value: "{value}" length, shouldn't be bigger than {constraints.0} characters
validation.MIN_STRING_LENGTH: {property} with value: "{value}" length, shouldn't be less than {constraints.0} characters

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Not Found
NOT_FOUND.GENERAL_DETAIL: Can not find the appropriate object. It doesn't exist anymore or you don't have access to it.
NOT_FOUND.MISSING_CONFIGURATION_FOR_FEATURE_DETAIL: The {featureName} feature you are trying to use is not configured. Please contact your administrator. If you are an administrator, please configure {featureName} first.
NOT_FOUND.OBJECT_NOT_FOUND_DETAIL: Can not find {objectName}. It doesn't exist anymore or you don't have access to it.

CONFLICT.TITLE: Conflict Error
CONFLICT.OPTIMISTIC_LOCK: Can not save changes for {entityName}. It has been changed by another user.
CONFLICT.ENTITY_ALREADY_EXISTS: Can not save changes for {entityName}. This data already created by another user.
CONFLICT.CAN_NOT_CREATE_ENTITY: Can not create {entityName} with {fieldName}: {fieldValue}. It already exists.

INTERNAL_ERROR.TITLE: Internal Server Error
INTERNAL_ERROR.GENERAL_DETAIL: An error occurred while processing your request. You don't need to contact support unless you want to. We are already working on it, and will contact you with explanation for this error.

FORBIDDEN.TITLE: Access Denied
FORBIDDEN.GENERAL_DETAIL: You don't have access to this resource. Please contact your administrator. If you are an administrator, please check your permissions.

UNAUTHORIZED.TITLE: Unauthorized
UNAUTHORIZED.GENERAL_DETAIL: Apologies, but you are not authorized to proceed with this action.
